name: History of a Crown
description:
History of a Crown is an adventure game based in a medieval kingdom where the player can explore the world and accomplish quests to win rewards.

This is a game created and developed by students for a final project from Institut Tecnològic de Barcelona.

Created and developed by:

  • Thais Camuñez
  • David Gilabert
  • Jorge Lalueza
  • Roger Serra
